query.statement: SELECT CASE WHEN A.VKBUR = 'C700' THEN '주차' WHEN A.VKBUR = 'C600' THEN '물류' WHEN A.VKBUR = 'C800' THEN 'PSD' ELSE '' END GUBUN, A.VKBUR, A.VKBUR_NM, A.VKGRP, A.VKGRP_NM, A.ZMAN, A.ZMAN_NM, A.KUNNR_NM, A.ZSITE_NM, A.PSPID, A.BSTDK, A.VDATU, A.EL, A.ES, A.WW, A.JJ, A.FF, A.GG, A.TT, A.YY, A.CAN, A.YCAN, A.SUJU, A.MECHUL, A.CHUNG, A.MICH, A.SUGM, A.MISU, A.SUGM_R, CASE WHEN A.VDA <> '00000000' THEN SAPHEE.MONTH_BETWEEN(A.VDA,CAST(#GIJUN# AS VARCHAR(8)),'1') ELSE 0 END VDA, A.NAB_T, A.QTY_J1, A.JAN_J1, CASE WHEN A.DAT_J1 IN ('00000000','99999999') THEN '' ELSE A.DAT_J1 END DAT_J1, A.MON_J1, A.QTY_J2, A.JAN_J2, CASE WHEN A.DAT_J2 IN ('00000000','99999999') THEN '' ELSE A.DAT_J2 END DAT_J2, A.MON_J2, A.QTY_J3, A.JAN_J3, CASE WHEN A.DAT_J3 IN ('00000000','99999999') THEN '' ELSE A.DAT_J3 END DAT_J3, A.MON_J3, A.QTY_J4, A.JAN_J4, CASE WHEN A.DAT_J4 IN ('00000000','99999999') THEN '' ELSE A.DAT_J4 END DAT_J4, A.MON_J4, A.QTY_J5, A.JAN_J5, CASE WHEN A.DAT_J5 IN ('00000000','99999999') THEN '' ELSE A.DAT_J5 END DAT_J5, A.MON_J5, A.QTY_F1, A.JAN_F1, CASE WHEN A.DAT_F1 IN ('00000000','99999999') THEN '' ELSE A.DAT_F1 END DAT_F1, A.MON_F1, A.QTY_F2, A.JAN_F2, CASE WHEN A.DAT_F2 IN ('00000000','99999999') THEN '' ELSE A.DAT_F2 END DAT_F2, A.MON_F2, A.QTY_F3, A.JAN_F3, CASE WHEN A.DAT_F3 IN ('00000000','99999999') THEN '' ELSE A.DAT_F3 END DAT_F3, A.MON_F3, A.QTY_G1, A.JAN_G1, CASE WHEN A.DAT_G1 IN ('00000000','99999999') THEN '' ELSE A.DAT_G1 END DAT_G1, A.MON_G1, A.QTY_G2, A.JAN_G2, CASE WHEN A.DAT_G2 IN ('00000000','99999999') THEN '' ELSE A.DAT_G2 END DAT_G2, A.MON_G2, A.QTY_G3, A.JAN_G3, CASE WHEN A.DAT_G3 IN ('00000000','99999999') THEN '' ELSE A.DAT_G3 END DAT_G3, A.MON_G3 FROM ( SELECT MAX(A.VKBUR) VKBUR, MAX(A.VKBUR_NM) VKBUR_NM, MAX(A.VKGRP) VKGRP, MAX(A.VKGRP_NM) VKGRP_NM, MAX(A.ZMAN) ZMAN, MAX(A.ZMAN_NM) ZMAN_NM, MAX(A.KUNNR_NM) KUNNR_NM, MAX(A.ZSITE_NM) ZSITE_NM, A.PSPID, MAX(A.BSTDK) BSTDK, MAX(A.VDATU) VDATU, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) = 'L' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) EL, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) = 'S' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) ES, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) = 'W' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) WW, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) = 'J' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) JJ, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) = 'F' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) FF, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) = 'G' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) GG, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) = 'T' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) TT, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) YY, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) NOT IN ('T','Y') AND B.TXT04 IN ('C','Z') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) CAN, SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(A.POSID,7,1) NOT IN ('T','Y') AND B.TXT04 = 'R7' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) YCAN, SUM(A.SUJU*100) SUJU, SUM(A.MECHUL*100) MECHUL, SUM(A.CHEONG*100) CHUNG, SUM(A.MICH*100) MICH, SUM(A.SUKEUM*100) SUGM, SUM(A.MISU*100) MISU, ROUND(CASE WHEN SUM(A.SUJU) <> 0 THEN FLOAT(SUM(A.SUKEUM))/FLOAT(SUM(A.SUJU))*100 ELSE 0 END,0) SUGM_R, MAX(CASE WHEN A.VDATU < #GIJUN# THEN A.VDATU ELSE '00000000' END) VDA, MAX(CASE WHEN A.VDATU < #GIJUN# AND A.MISU > 0 AND (A.ZZCOMP2 = '00000000' OR A.ZZCOMP2 > #GIJUN# OR A.ZZJUNGO = '') THEN '납경미' ELSE '' END) NAB_T, SUM(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'J' AND GUBUNB = 'J0100' AND A.VDATU > #GIJUN# THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTY_J1, SUM(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'J' AND GUBUNB = 'J0100' AND A.VDATU > #GIJUN# THEN A.JANEW ELSE 0 END) JAN_J1, MAX(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'J' AND GUBUNB = 'J0100' AND A.VDATU > #GIJUN# THEN A.VDATU ELSE '00000000' END) DAT_J1, MAX(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'J' AND GUBUNB = 'J0100' AND A.VDATU > #GIJUN# THEN A.AGING ELSE 0 END) MON_J1, SUM(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'J' AND GUBUNB = 'J0100' AND A.VDATU <= #GIJUN# THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTY_J2, SUM(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'J' AND GUBUNB = 'J0100' AND A.VDATU <= #GIJUN# THEN A.JANEW ELSE 0 END) JAN_J2, MAX(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'J' AND GUBUNB = 'J0100' AND A.VDATU <= #GIJUN# THEN A.VDATU ELSE '00000000' END) DAT_J2, MIN(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'J' AND GUBUNB = 'J0100' AND A.VDATU <= #GIJUN# THEN A.AGING ELSE 0 END) MON_J2, SUM(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'J' AND GUBUNB = 'J0200' AND SAPHEE.MONTH_BETWEEN(A.FKDAT_L,CAST(#GIJUN# AS VARCHAR(8)),'1') <= 12 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTY_J3, SUM(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'J' AND GUBUNB = 'J0200' AND SAPHEE.MONTH_BETWEEN(A.FKDAT_L,CAST(#GIJUN# AS VARCHAR(8)),'1') <= 12 THEN A.JANEW ELSE 0 END) JAN_J3, MAX(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'J' AND GUBUNB = 'J0200' AND SAPHEE.MONTH_BETWEEN(A.FKDAT_L,CAST(#GIJUN# AS VARCHAR(8)),'1') <= 12 THEN A.FKDAT_S ELSE '00000000' END) DAT_J3, MIN(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'J' AND GUBUNB = 'J0200' AND SAPHEE.MONTH_BETWEEN(A.FKDAT_L,CAST(#GIJUN# AS VARCHAR(8)),'1') <= 12 THEN A.AGING ELSE 0 END) MON_J3, SUM(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'J' AND GUBUNB = 'J0200' AND SAPHEE.MONTH_BETWEEN(A.FKDAT_L,CAST(#GIJUN# AS VARCHAR(8)),'1') > 12 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTY_J4, SUM(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'J' AND GUBUNB = 'J0200' AND SAPHEE.MONTH_BETWEEN(A.FKDAT_L,CAST(#GIJUN# AS VARCHAR(8)),'1') > 12 THEN A.JANEW ELSE 0 END) JAN_J4, MAX(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'J' AND GUBUNB = 'J0200' AND SAPHEE.MONTH_BETWEEN(A.FKDAT_L,CAST(#GIJUN# AS VARCHAR(8)),'1') > 12 THEN A.FKDAT_L ELSE '00000000' END) DAT_J4, MIN(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'J' AND GUBUNB = 'J0200' AND SAPHEE.MONTH_BETWEEN(A.FKDAT_L,CAST(#GIJUN# AS VARCHAR(8)),'1') > 12 THEN A.AGING ELSE 0 END) MON_J4, SUM(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'J' AND GUBUNB = 'J0300' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTY_J5, SUM(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'J' AND GUBUNB = 'J0300' THEN A.JANEW ELSE 0 END) JAN_J5, MAX(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'J' AND GUBUNB = 'J0300' THEN A.FKDAT_L ELSE '00000000' END) DAT_J5, MIN(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'J' AND GUBUNB = 'J0300' THEN A.AGING ELSE 0 END) MON_J5, SUM(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'F' AND GUBUNB = 'F0100' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTY_F1, SUM(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'F' AND GUBUNB = 'F0100' THEN A.JANEW ELSE 0 END) JAN_F1, MAX(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'F' AND GUBUNB = 'F0100' THEN A.FKDAT_L ELSE '00000000' END) DAT_F1, MIN(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'F' AND GUBUNB = 'F0100' THEN A.AGING ELSE 0 END) MON_F1, SUM(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'F' AND GUBUNB = 'F0200' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTY_F2, SUM(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'F' AND GUBUNB = 'F0200' THEN A.JANEW ELSE 0 END) JAN_F2, MAX(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'F' AND GUBUNB = 'F0200' THEN A.FKDAT_L ELSE '00000000' END) DAT_F2, MIN(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'F' AND GUBUNB = 'F0200' THEN A.AGING ELSE 0 END) MON_F2, SUM(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'F' AND GUBUNB = 'F0300' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTY_F3, SUM(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'F' AND GUBUNB = 'F0300' THEN A.JANEW ELSE 0 END) JAN_F3, MAX(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'F' AND GUBUNB = 'F0300' THEN A.FKDAT_L ELSE '00000000' END) DAT_F3, MIN(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'F' AND GUBUNB = 'F0300' THEN A.AGING ELSE 0 END) MON_F3, SUM(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'G' AND GUBUNB = 'G0100' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTY_G1, SUM(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'G' AND GUBUNB = 'G0100' THEN A.JANEW ELSE 0 END) JAN_G1, MAX(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'G' AND GUBUNB = 'G0100' THEN A.FKDAT_L ELSE '00000000' END) DAT_G1, MIN(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'G' AND GUBUNB = 'G0100' THEN A.AGING ELSE 0 END) MON_G1, SUM(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'G' AND GUBUNB = 'G0200' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTY_G2, SUM(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'G' AND GUBUNB = 'G0200' THEN A.JANEW ELSE 0 END) JAN_G2, MAX(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'G' AND GUBUNB = 'G0200' THEN A.FKDAT_L ELSE '00000000' END) DAT_G2, MIN(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'G' AND GUBUNB = 'G0200' THEN A.AGING ELSE 0 END) MON_G2, SUM(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'G' AND GUBUNB = 'G0300' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) QTY_G3, SUM(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'G' AND GUBUNB = 'G0300' THEN A.JANEW ELSE 0 END) JAN_G3, MAX(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'G' AND GUBUNB = 'G0300' THEN A.FKDAT_L ELSE '00000000' END) DAT_G3, MIN(CASE WHEN GUBUNA = 'G' AND GUBUNB = 'G0300' THEN A.AGING ELSE 0 END) MON_G3 FROM SAPHEE.ZEIST200 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.PSPID = B.POSID AND A.POSID = B.POSID_1 WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.GUBUNA <> 'Z' AND A.GBN = 'C' GROUP BY A.PSPID ORDER BY 1,3,5,9 ) A WITH UR
